overview:
Marine Leroux is the founder and CEO of San Francisco-based mobile firm Bamboudesign, Inc. and a veteran in the development of web and mobile applications, from strategy, design and development, to marketing, e-commerce, e-training, video and audio.

Marine brings thirteen years of design and management experience in mobile technology, complex applications, multimedia, ecommerce and online marketing. She launched Bamboudesign in Paris in 2004, specializing in web site and application user experience design, then in San Francisco in 2008 to focus on mobile application development. She currently heads Bamboudesign in San Francisco where she has contributed to the audit, design, and development of mobile application projects for beverage companies, the French metro system, a software company, and a large electronics manufacturer.

She founded and hosts the iPhone Network Lounge, San Franciscoâ€™s largest Meetup network of iPhone professionals. She also talks regularly about mobile design and technology, user experience, and entrepreneurship to schools, TV, professional venues and firms.

In previous positions, she co-founded TTZ.com, a web globalization company in San Francisco, and managed Adobeâ€™s international online stores and sales, where she helped build Macromedia’s European online stores. She headed the development of an online presence for French bank BNP Paribas and Palo Alto firm Fawcette Technical Publications, and designed e-learning products for Microsoft.
